name: Kesha Was Bird Remaster
description:
Originally written for CHIP8 as a part of awfuljams, this is first instalment in Kesha universe games ported to ZX. 

Surreal telephone adventure about espionage, treachery and fishapocalipse driven by DTMF sounds. 

This game requires any ZX Spectum emulator or real ZX 48k. 

You can play original CHIP8 game by the link below

http://www.awfuljams.com/little-awful-2016/games/kesha-was-bird
